org.agilewiki.jactor2.util.durable.block

Class LA32Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.util.durable.block.LBlock
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.util.durable.block.LA32Block
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Block

    public class LA32Block
extends LBlock
    A block with a length and Adler32 checksum in the header.
